locale.name: en_US
locale.message: An image file is required. Please ensure that you have chosen and uploaded a file.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this announcement?
Please select a year and/or month in addition to the expiry date day.
The announcement will be displayed to readers until this date. Leave blank if the announcement should be displayed indefinitely.
Please select a year and/or day in addition to the expiry date month.
Please select a valid announcement expiry date.
Please select a month and/or day in addition to the expiry date year.
The full text of the announcement.
A brief description to appear along with the announcement title.
A short announcement description is required.
Please select a valid announcement type.
Warning! All announcements with this announcement type will also be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue and delete this announcement type?
An announcement type with this name already exists.
An announcement type name is required.
No announcement types have been created.
Are you sure you want to delete this email template?
Are you sure you want to reset this email template to its default values?
You are about to disable this email template. If there were system processes using this template, they will not use it anymore. Do you want to confirm this operation?
An email with the given key already exists. Email keys must be unique.
You are about to enable this email. Do you want to confirm this operation?
A unique email key containing no spaces or special characters is required for the email.
A body is required for the email.
A subject is required for the email.
If you reset all templates, all modifications to the email templates will be lost. Do you want to confirm this operation?
If you reset this template, all message data will be reset to its default value, losing all modifications. Do you want to confirm this operation?
Delete this file or directory? Note that a directory must be empty before it can be deleted.
No files were found in this directory.
Are you sure you wish to delete this group?
Are you sure you wish to delete this group membership?
This system optionally allows certain critical information to be entered in several additional languages. To use this feature, select alternate locales and choose from the options listed below.
Select all locales to support on the site via a language select menu to appear on each page. The menu will only appear if more than one locale is selected.
An existing user must be entered.
Send the user a welcome email containing their username and password.
Select the users you would like to email by checking the boxes beside their names
Users can be assigned to, or removed from, a role at any point.
Sorry, the requested user does not exist.

Are you sure you wish to merge the selected {$oldAccountCount} account(s) into the account with the username "{$newUsername}"? The selected {$oldAccountCount} accounts will not exist afterwards. This action is not reversible.
Please select a role at the top of the page before clicking "Enroll User".
Please provide at least a last name for the user first.
Require the user to change their password the next time they log in.
This is a site-wide plugin. Only the Site Administrator may manage this plugin.
Use the form below to set the maximum values for the terms you wish to search for. The form is pre-populated with the calculated averages of those fields.

Your {$contextObjectName} is configured to record more than one usage metric. Usage statistics will be displayed in several contexts. There are cases where a single usage statistic must be used, e.g. to display an ordered list of most-used submissions or to rank search results. Please select one of the configured metrics as a default.

The system generates reports that track the details associated with site usage and submissions over a given period of time. Reports are generated in CSV format which requires a spreadsheet application to view.

Items in italic and marked with * represents data that is optional to the current way of counting statistics in the system (metric type). You might have that data or not, depending on your statistics plugin configuration.

Define the columns that will be used to build the report. The columns you select here not only define which data will be presented inside the reports, but also defines the aggregation level of the statistics. For example, if you choose ID, Type and Month columns, the report will sum all views from an object from one month and will present that data in one row. If you choose Day instead of Month, each object will have a row for each day.
Define one or more object ids, comma separated (e.g. 1,2,3,4,5).
One or more city names, comma separated (e.g. City Name 1,City Name 2)
You have to select at least one column to generate the report.

The following url can be used to generate the report with the current form settings. Just copy it and open it in your browser. You can also store it as your custom report url generator in your bookmarks.
By object type and/or object id
Narrow results by country, region and/or city.
Anything entered here will appear on your homepage.
Require authors to agree to the Copyright Notice as part of the submission process.
Recommended guidelines include bibliographic and formatting standards alongside examples of common citation formats to be used in submissions.
Reviewers will be asked to comply with the competing interests disclosure policy you specify below.
There was an error when deleting this item.
Invalid favicon format. Accepted formats are .ico, .png, and .gif.
Invalid homepage header logo image format or upload failed. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, or .png.
Upload an image to display prominently on the homepage.
Invalid homepage image format or upload failed. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, or .png.
Invalid homepage header title image format or upload failed. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, or .png.
New themes may be installed from the Plugins tab at the top of this page.
Send a copy to this email address
Authors are automatically sent an email acknowledging their submission. You may have copies of this email sent to the following:
If providing immediate free access to all published content, you may enter a description of your Open Access Policy.
Invalid page header logo image format or upload failed. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, or .png.
Enter any images, text or HTML code that you'd like to appear at the bottom of your website.

Outline the peer review policy and processes for readers and authors. This description often includes the number of reviewers typically used in reviewing a submission, the criteria by which reviewers are asked to judge submissions, expected time required to conduct the reviews, and the principles used to select reviewers.
Enter contact details, typically for a principal editorship, managing editorship, or administrative staff position, which can be displayed on your publicly accessible website.

This statement will appear during user registration, author submission, and on the publicly available Privacy page. In some jurisdictions, you are legally required to disclose how you handle user data in this privacy policy.
Weeks allowed to accept or decline a review request
Defaults can be modified for each review during the editorial process.
Send a reminder if a reviewer has not responded to a review request within the following time (days) after response due date:
Send a reminder if a reviewer has not submitted a recommendation within the following time (days) after review's due date:
Present a link to "Ensuring a Blind Review" during upload
A XML sitemap is available for submitting to search engines at {$path}
Examples: scholarly associations, university departments, cooperatives, etc. Sponsors are displayed publicly.
Experienced web developers can upload a CSS file to further customize the website's appearance.
A contact person who can assist editors, authors and reviewers with any problems they have submitting, editing, reviewing or publishing material.
Metadata Plugins implement additional meta-data standards.
Block Plugins are pluggable UI components, such as the various sidebar tools.
Gateway Plugins provide live data to external systems.
Import/Export Plugins can be used to transfer content to and from other systems.
Payment Method plugins implement support for various ways of processing payments online.
Report Plugins are used to implement various types of reports and data extracts.
Theme Plugins can be used to change the system's appearance.
These format plugins express metadata in OAI communications.
These plugins implement support for a public identifier.

Plugin was not successfully copied. This may be a permissions problem. Please make sure that the web server is able to write to the plugins directory (including subdirectories) but don't forget to secure it again later.
Are you sure you wish to install this plugin?
Are you sure you wish to upgrade this plugin?
Are you sure you wish to delete this plugin from the system?
By clicking delete, you will delete the plugin from the server's file system.

Plugin "{$pluginName}" could not be deleted from the file system. This may be a permissions problem. Please make sure that the web server is able to write to the plugins directory (including subdirectories) but don't forget to secure it again later.

This page allows the Manager to review and potentially configure the plugins that are currently installed. Plugins are divided into categories, according to their function. The categories are listed below, and within each category, its current set of plugins.
This form allows you to upload and install a new plugin. Please ensure the plugin is compressed as a .tar.gz file.
Please ensure a file was selected for upload.
This plugin is developed and maintained by the Public Knowledge Project team.
This plugin has been reviewed and approved by the Public Knowledge Project team.
This plugin is provided by one of our development partners.
The plugin has not yet been installed.
There is currently no compatible version of this plugin available.
Plugin already installed, and is newer than the version available in the gallery.
Plugin already installed, but can be updated to a newer version.
The uploaded plugin archive does not contain a folder that corresponds to the plugin name.
The uploaded plugin does not fit the category of the upgraded plugin.
The version.xml in the uploaded plugin contains a plugin name that does not fit the name of the upgraded plugin.
Plugin does not exist. Please Install instead
Plugin already exists, but is newer than installed version. Please upgrade instead
The tar command is not available. Please correctly configure it in your "config.inc.php".
This form allows you to upgrade a plugin. Please ensure the plugin is compressed as a .tar.gz file.
version.xml in plugin directory contains invalid data.
version.xml not found in plugin directory
All selected locale(s) installed and activated.
Payments made directly through this website will be denominated in the selected currency.
Show role title in contributor list
This role is only allowed to recommend a review decision and will require an authorised editor to record a final decision.
You are about to remove this role from this context. This operation will also delete related settings and all the users assignments to this role. Do you want to continue?
You need to define a role name.
You need to define a role abbreviature.
You need to define an unique role name.
You need to define an unique role abbreviature.
You need to define a role permission level.
You need to define a stage to assign to.
A library file is required. Please ensure that you have chosen and uploaded a file.
A name is required for this library file.
A file type is required for this library file.

This library file can be accessible for download, if "Public Access" is enabled, at:

{$downloadUrl}
Restore the components to the default settings
Mark files of this type as dependent files (e.g. not to be listed with published content)
Mark files of this type as supplementary files (e.g. not primary submission content)
An optional short symbolic identifer for this genre.
The key can contain only alphanumeric characters, underscores, and hyphens, and must begin and end with an alphanumeric character.
You need to select at least one role to be associated with this user.
Are you sure you wish to activate this review form? Once it's assigned to a review you will no longer be able to deactivate it.
Are you sure you wish to deactivate this review form? It will no longer be available for new review assignments.
Are you sure you wish to create a copy of this review form?
Are you sure you wish to delete this review form?
A title is required for the review form.

The peer review forms created here will be presented to reviewers to complete, instead of the default form which consists of two open text boxes, the first "for author and editor," and the second "for editor." Review forms can be designated for a specific press section, and editors will have the option to choose which form to use in assigning the review. In all cases, editors will have the option of including the reviews in corresponding with the author.
No review forms have been created.
No review forms have been used.
Checkboxes (you can choose one or more)
Confirm delete of a published form item...
An item type is required for the form item.
A question is required for the form item.
No form items have been created.
Radio buttons (you can only choose one)
Request a Competing Interest statement during the peer review.
URL to a webpage describing the license, if available.
The content is not encoded as {$param}
Temporary file {$dest} could not be created from {$source}
The provided filesize "{$expected}" and the actual filesize "{$actual}" do not match
The revision "{$revisionId}" for submission file "{$fileId}" would create a duplicate record
The submission file could not be imported

This page will be accessible at:

{$pagesPath}
...where %PATH% is the path entered above. Note: No two pages can have the same path. Using paths that are built into the system may cause you to lose access to important functions.
The path field must contain only alphanumeric characters plus '.', '/', '-', and '_'.
This path already exists for another navigation menu item.
This title already exists for another navigation menu.
A navigation menu is already assigned to this area.
Learn more about when this menu item will be displayed or hidden.

When a menu item opens a submenu, it's link can not be followed on all devices. For example, if you have an "About" item which opens a submenu with "Contact" and "Editorial Team", the "About" link may not be reachable on all devices. In the default menu, this is handled by creating a second menu item, "About the Journal", which appears in the submenu.
Select a Navigation Menu Type or Custom to make your own
Create a custom page on your site and link to it from a navigation menu.
Link to any URL on another site, like https://pkp.sfu.ca.
Link to a page displaying the About the Journal content in Settings > Journal
This link will only be displayed if you have filled out the About the Journal section under Settings > Journal.
Link to a page displaying the Masthead content in Settings > Journal.
This link will only be displayed if you have filled out the Editorial Team section under Settings > Journal.
Link to the page displaying submission instructions.
Link to the page displaying your announcements.
This link will only be displayed if you have enabled announcements under Settings > Website.
Link to the user login page.
Link to the user registration page.
Link to the user profile page.
Link to the site-wide administration tools.
This link will only be displayed to administrative users.
A link that will log the user out.
This link will only be displayed when the visitor is logged in.
This link will only be displayed when the visitor is not logged in.
Link to a page displaying your contact information.
This link will only be displayed if you have filled out the Contact information under Settings > Contact.
Please select a navigation menu type.
This link will only be displayed if payments are enabled under Settings > Distribution > Payments.
This link will only be displayed if the visitor is logged in, payments are enabled under Settings > Distribution > Payments and subscriptions are required under Settings > Distribution > Access.
Link to the page displaying your privacy statement.
This link will only be displayed if you have entered a privacy statement under Settings > Workflow > Submissions.
